repository.orgName: Staats- und UniversitätsBibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This palm-leaf manuscript at first seems like an Single Text Manuscript(STM), but contains a few leaves at the end with what it presents as a different text. Although the information has been entered as for an Multiple Text Manuscript(MTM), it is in all likelihood the same text, with the second text possibly being a few stray leaves added to the lot.

msItem.title: Dramiḍopaniṣadttātparyaratnāvalī savyākhyā
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśika & <term xml:lang="en">anonymous</term>
msItem.rubric: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmadśrīveṃkaṭāryamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmate śrīnivāsasaṃyamīndramahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīmadvedāntarāmānujamahādeśikāya namaḥ | śrīmategopāladeśikamahāgu<lb n="2"/>rave namaḥ śrīmate nigamāntagurave namaḥ śrīmate bhagavadrāmānujāya namaḥ śriraṃganāyikāsametaśrīraṃganāthaparabrahmaṇe namaḥ | śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ |
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="3"/>vigāhe nigamāntāryadayādivyataraṃgiṇīṃ | saṃsāragarbhasaṃtaptasaṃjīvanavicakṣaṇāṃ | śaṭhārisūktitātparyaratnāvalim imām ahaṃ | vedāntā<lb n="4"/>cāryavihitāṃ vivṛṇomi satāṃ mude | sākṣānnārāyaṇo devaḥ kṛtvā marttya <sic>mayīntanaṃ</sic> | <sic>maśnānukurute</sic> <sic>lokān kāruṇyāṃ</sic> sya pā<lb n="5"/>ṇinā eṉṟum manānāṃ bhavināṃ bhavāṇṛvasamuntorāya nārāyaṇaḥ eṉṟum

msItem.title: Dramiḍopaniṣadttātparyaratnāvalī
msItem.author: Vedānta Deśika
msItem.incipit: <pb n="1r"/> <lb n="1"/>śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ - śrīmān+rī vedāntācārya+di sevāyogyotibhogyaśśubhagata
msItem.explicit: <pb n="4v"/> <lb n="1"/><gap reason="ellipsis"/>iti kavitārkikasiṃhasya<lb n="2"/>śrīmadvedāntācāryasya kṛtiṣu dramiḍopaniṣatsāras sampūrṇaḥ kavitārkikasiṃhāya + śrīmate namaḥ
msItem.colophon: <pb n="4v"/> <lb n="3"/><seg function="blessing">hariḥ om śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ</seg>

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil-letter numerals, left margin up to folio 52 and then on the right margin

origin.origDate: Date not given. Likely late 18th or 19th century

encodingDesc.p: IAST for Sanskrit words and ISO for Tamil words; no abbreviations

revisionDesc.change:
Added XML tags, measured dimensions of the leaves and distance b/w the 2 string holes.
edited by: Gayathri G
